objective:
隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自 2002 年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods (EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety (i.e. natural hazards control) but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to promote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical aspects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosophy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.
schedule:
Week 1: 課程說明與生態工程總論
Week 2　生態工法設計原則
Week 3　公共工程與生態：交通、水利工程
Week 4　公共工程與生態：能源設施、環保設施
Week 5　生態材料
Week 6 河川生態工程：原則與設計
Week 7　生態護岸、生態壩體、固床工、魚道
Week 8　水庫生態工程：原則與設計、工法
Week 9 期中考
Week 10-11　個人報告：案例介紹
Week 12　山坡地生態工程：原則與設計
Week 13　植生護坡、生態擋土牆
Week 14　道路生態工程：原則與設計、生態廊道
Week 15　透水鋪面
Week 16　綠營建
Week 17 生態工程維護與管理
Week 18 期末考
